item.description: Susan Sackett has been tentatively rescheduled for June 15th. In place of Susan's talk on Tuesday, a presentation entitled "The Future of Humanism" will be provided by David Niose, president of the AHA. He'll be giving an update on happenings within the humanist movement nationally & some of the new approaches to humanist activism that the AHA is planning. Doors open at 6:30, and the meeting starts at 7. Looking forward to seeing you then!
item.name: David Niose: "The Future of Humanism"
